#STAAR data
```{r}
#STAAR data
library(ideadata)
library(ideadata)
library(dplyr)

staar_data <-   get_table(.table_name = "STAAR", .database_name = "Dashboard", .schema = "dbo", .server_name = "RGVPDRA-DASQL") %>%
  select(AdminDate, LocalStudentID, StudentID, GradeLevel, SchoolYear, TestVersion, RawScore, ScaleScore, LevelII, LevelIII, LevelIIFinal, BestRecord, Percentile, Growth) %>%
  filter(SchoolYear == "2023-2024")
  collect() 
staar_data



```
